Name: Scramble
About the game: Scramble is a resource management game in which you compete against other companies for the colonization of the New World. Select Your Nation In the Scramble, every nation has different advantages that change the way you should play the game. Manage Resources Make progress by using the limited resources you have logically. Colonize New Provinces Colonize new provinces producing the resource you need. Develop Provinces Build buildings to increase efficiency, give the needed materials to increase population capacity. Dominate Rival Companies Capture the resources they need, stop them to colonize by cutting their connection, and much more. There are several strategies you can use to dominate a rival company. Dynamic Trade Trade system is unique and completely organic in the Scramble. The price of the resources goes up and down according to their rarety.
Meta Title: Scramble: Mar 1, 2021, Nyberius and Full Overview
Meta Description: Looking for information on Scramble? Check out the release date (Mar 1, 2021), developer insights from Nyberius, and a complete game summary.
